Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils

Class CliUtils

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.CliUtils
public class CliUtils
extends java.lang.Object
Class that define and implements some useful functions that are used by the Cli
Since:
2020/06/18

    • clearAndPrintInfo

      public static void clearAndPrintInfo​(java.util.List<Player> opponents, Player currentPlayer, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Card> deck, java.util.List<java.lang.String> constraints, SantoriniMap map)
      Method used to clear the shell and print some info regards the match
      Parameters:
      opponents - List of the opponents of the current player
      currentPlayer - Player that invoke this method
      deck - Set of all cards
      constraints - List of string of possible constraints
      map - The map object of the current game

      Method used to print all the info required (not the map) by the clearAndPrintInfo methods
      Parameters:
      opponents - List of the opponents of the current player
      currentPlayer - Player that invoke this method
      deck - Set of all cards
      constraints - List of string of possible constraints

      Method used to set if there is a new chat message
      Parameters:
      newChatMessage - Boolean value (true = new chat message | false = no new chat message)

      visualized - True if is visualized (entered in chat)

      player - Last player that has sent a message in chat
      chatMessage - Last chat message received in chat

    • getColorCliFromPlayer

      public static Color getColorCliFromPlayer​(Color color)
      Method used to convert the color of a player (an enum of string contained in the model) in the corresponding color value useful in the cli to print colors
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the player
      Returns:
      playerColor Color converted in the correct cli color value (contained in the Color enum of the Cli)

      Method used to get player object using his nickname
      Parameters:
      players - List of players actually in the current game
      nickName - String nickname of the asked player
      Returns:
      aksedPlayer Player whose nickname is passed as a parameter

      background - Background color
      Returns:

    • getArrow

      public static int getArrow()
      Method used to get arrow values as user's input. It also convert the terminal mode in the raw mode and then it reset its
      Returns:
      arrow Int value that represent the arrow value

    • getArrowUpDown

      public static int getArrowUpDown()
      Method use to get (through getArrow) only up and down arrows
      Returns:
      upOrDown Int value that represents the user's choice (up or down)

    • controlWaitEnter

      public static int controlWaitEnter​(java.lang.String type)
      Method used to wait the user press "ENTER" (or something else represented by the type parameter)
      Parameters:
      type - String that represents which values should be accepted from the user
      Returns:
      userChoice Int value that represents the user's choice (one of the options allowed by the type or "ENTER")
